alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 01 at 1:06AM PDT until April 04 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In California, Eastern Sierra Slopes, Owens Valley, White Mountains of Inyo County and Death Valley National Park. In Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northwest winds will accompany a strong cold front moving through the area. In addition to the strong winds, patchy blowing dust will be possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County
